member.name: TS_SELECTION_ACP
member.summary: The TS_SELECTION_ACP structure contains ACP-based text selection data.

member.name: TS_SELECTION_ACP.acpStart
member.summary: Contains the start position of the selection.

member.name: TS_SELECTION_ACP.acpEnd
member.summary: Contains the end position of the selection.

member.name: TS_SELECTION_ACP.style
member.summary: A structure that contains additional selection data.
